comments.body: This is the main issue. What do you think about it?
I agree with you, user1. This is indeed an important issue that needs attention.
Has anyone started working on this? I'd like to contribute.
Thanks for the interest, user3! Feel free to jump in and contribute. We haven't started yet.
I've submitted a pull request addressing this issue. Take a look and let me know your thoughts.
Great work, user4! I'll review the pull request and provide feedback soon.
